title: 8,000 Love Poems
description:
Peter Gordon loved his wife so much, he told her in a poem every day. But when she passed away, he had to find a new way to keep the love alive.

Read Peter’s poems to Alison at A Love in Verse.

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
